author: Leigh Beadon
description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is danderbandit with a comment about Trump’s assertions regarding the Insurrection Act: 50%? I don’t think so! “I’m allowed as you know as president, like 50% of the presidents have used the Insurrection Act.” https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_invocations_of_the_Insurrection_Act#:~:text=The%20act%20has%20been%20invoked,the%201992%20Los%20Angeles%20riots. Per that article, the Insurrection Act has been invoked 31 […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
